casebody.data:
IN RE LEONARD. 2017-1659 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 23, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

Sua sponte, Robert Kolter Leonard, Attorney Registration No. 0010537, last known business address in Lima, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before January 16, 2018.
